statements.query: MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})-[:RESOURCE]->(q:SQSQueue) WHERE q.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH q LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (q)
MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})-[:RESOURCE]->(:SQSQueue)-[r:HAS_DEADLETTER_QUEUE]->(:SQSQueue) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r)
statements.__comment__: Cleanup HAS_DEADLETTER_QUEUE for queues that no longer have a deadletter queue.
